safetyTips: Contactless delivery. No Cash payments. Following strict social distance rules.
name: EVEREST INN ASHFORD
description: Nepalese and Indian restaurant providing Takeaway and home delivery service to Ashford and surrounding area - within a 4 mile radius. 15% Collection discount or Free home delivery. Open Tuesday to Sunday from 5 pm to 9 pm.  Order online, via our website or by phone.
